title: Jimmy Begood
description: Jimmy Begood has fallen in love but doesn't realize it! And the woman he's fallen fall for is a bartender and college student who is secretly doing a research paper on womanizers - and her subject, none other than Jimmy Begood! Jimmy Begood is a satirical look at love in the 21st century. Jimmy Begood easily falls in love but only one woman holds the key to his heart. Begood is like every man, he loves bars, beer, and women. Begood takes on a ride as he lives his every day existence searching for something he doesn't know is missing. Jimmy Begood by James Halon is a must read!
author: James Halon
